roleset.name: to form, constitute
roleset.note: COMPOSE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'compose' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from compose.01-v predicate notes)
COMPOSITION-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry compose.01, OntoNotes grouping composition-n sense 7; maps to VN class create-26.4. Framed by Claire. (from composition.01-n)

example.name: passive
example.text: [The team]-1 was composed [*-1]of representatives from engineering , manufacturing , corporate estimating , flight test , material , quality control , and other departments .
example.arg: of representatives from engineering , manufacturing , corporate estimating , flight test , material , quality control , and other departments

example.name: All arguments
example.text: His composition of a theory from these scanty facts seems quite premature.

example.name: All arguments, alternate syntax
example.text: Mary's composition of the wild flowers into a bridal bouquet was astonishingly fast.

roleset.name: to create, produce art

example.name: not in the corpus
example.text: John composed this poem for his wife.

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: We watched the composition of sand paintings by local artists at the annual town fair.

example.name: Args 0 & 1, new syntax
example.text: His composition of that symphony only took five weeks.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: The 20 year career of songwriter Diane Warren, born in the 1950s, is described, with focus on her composition of award winning songs for films.
